title: Cheer on the Autumn of Exercise!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Ahh...... What a relaxing day.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>We even got to have carrot bread.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Oh, hey, hey, Emma-san. Ai-chan is helping the Basketball Club out with their practice games today, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah, she said that they’d play four games from morning until afternoon today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Alright, let’s go cheer them on!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>What!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>It’s an autumn of exercise. We should be cheering them on!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu, alright. Let’s go, then.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Let’s hype them up~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
